name: The Uncutest Adventure - Episode 1: Zango and the dragon
name_original: The Uncutest Adventure - Episode 1: Zango and the dragon
description:
Zango is a cute fluffy boy which it's a shame in the jungle's rules. Also, he is the son of the king. 

After he got kicked from home by his mother,  he started a journey looking for a way to be more wild and ugly, but the journey isn't cute!
